Russia is the world's largest diamond pr: Which country is the world's largest diamond producer? Russia diamond production rank
Russia. Russia holds what is believed to be the world's largest and richest diamond resources. They are the world's largest producer and exporter of rough diamonds by volume.
Which country is the world's largest diamond producer? Russia diamond production rank

Production: 37.32 million carats Russia is currently the world's leading producer of gem-quality diamonds by carat weight and has held this leading position for more than 10 years, producing around 32% of the world's total mined diamonds. PJSC Alrosa is the biggest diamond mining enterprise worldwide.
